Strings.Text: {scroll 2}It's the desk of WeskerⅠ\nCaptain of ＳＴＡＲＳ
{scroll 2}It's the desk of Barry,\na ＳＴＡＲＳ team member.{clear 0}A pair of replica guns\nare on the desk.

{scroll 2}There are various
trophies.{clear 0}
One of them reads:{clear 0}‟Marksman Contest Winner:
Chris Redfield”

{scroll 2}It's the desk of Chris,
a ＳＴＡＲＳ team member.{clear 0}Its disorganization
probably reflects the{clear 0}
owner's personality.
{scroll 2}It's the desk of Rebecca,\na rookie member of ＳＴＡＲＳ
{scroll 2}A box of files from past\ncases.{clear 0}\nNothing useful here.

{scroll 2}A large communications
device.{clear 0}
It's out of commission.{clear 0}I can't send
any messages from here.
